EmailTemplate.name: EMEA_Event_Adopting SV State of Mind_Q316.Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Confirmation: Adopting the Silicon Valley State of Mind
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://pivotal.io/event/adopting-the-silicon-valley-state-of-mind/london]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for registering for the upcoming Adopting the Silicon Valley State of Mind in London. See event details below:
Date: 29 September 2016 {{my.Save the Date}} Time: 12:00-4:00 PM Location: Pivotal London, The Warehouse, 211 Old Street, 2nd Floor, London EC1V 9NR
AGENDA
We look forward to meeting you soon!
The Pivotal Team
Questions? Please contact Nick Holden at nholden@pivotal.io <[[mailto:nholden@pivotal.io]]> or Ines Schuller at ischuller@pivotal.io <[[mailto:ischuller@pivotal.io]]>.
